tasks.title: Fix discover_work() to not short-circuit on completed/stale tasks
tasks.description: The _load_pending_tasks() returns immediately if ANY pending tasks exist, preventing coverage/tech tree/Nemo discovery from running. Fix: filter out stale tasks before returning, or continue to other discovery sources even when pending tasks exist.

tasks.title: Diagnose and fix dashboard crash (exit code 1)
tasks.description: The SLATE Dashboard task exits with code 1 immediately on startup. Investigate aurora_dashboard_server.py / agents/aurora_dashboard_server.py for the root cause and fix.

tasks.title: Add new tech tree nodes for Phase 2 capabilities (UV, Discord)
tasks.description: All 16 tech tree nodes are 100% complete. Add new Phase 2 nodes: UV package manager migration, Discord bot completion (#17). Set status to 'available' so autonomous discovery finds them.
